expedition_journals.name: Engineer's Log #1
expedition_journals.description: First entry detailing the expedition preparations
expedition_journals.hint: On the workbench next to the main entrance

expedition_journals.name: Scout Report #1
expedition_journals.description: Initial reconnaissance of the expedition route
expedition_journals.hint: Hidden behind supply crates in the guard tower

expedition_journals.name: Artist's Diary
expedition_journals.description: Lune's observations on paint magic manifestations
expedition_journals.hint: Inside the paint-splattered easel room

expedition_journals.name: Marksman's Notes
expedition_journals.description: Maelle's tactical analysis of enemy positions
expedition_journals.hint: Telescope case on the highest platform

expedition_journals.name: Noble's Testament
expedition_journals.description: Sciel's reflection on duty and honor
expedition_journals.hint: Inside the family portrait frame

expedition_journals.name: Dual Memories
expedition_journals.description: Verso's struggle with their dual nature
expedition_journals.hint: In the broken mirror that shows two reflections
expedition_journals.missable_reason: Area becomes inaccessible after boss fight

expedition_journals.name: Inventor's Blueprint
expedition_journals.description: Monoco's gadget designs and theories
expedition_journals.hint: Hidden compartment in the main workstation

expedition_journals.name: Battle Formation Alpha
expedition_journals.description: Tactical formation notes from group training
expedition_journals.hint: Buried under the sand in the sparring ring

expedition_journals.name: Expedition Medical Log
expedition_journals.description: Medical officer's notes on party health
expedition_journals.hint: Inside the medical bag by the tent entrance

expedition_journals.name: Quartermaster's Inventory
expedition_journals.description: Detailed list of expedition supplies and usage
expedition_journals.hint: Clipboard hanging on the supply rack

expedition_journals.name: Weather Observer's Log
expedition_journals.description: Meteorological observations affecting the journey
expedition_journals.hint: Telescope viewing chamber, check the logbook

expedition_journals.name: Geological Survey
expedition_journals.description: Analysis of unusual mineral formations
expedition_journals.hint: Next to the largest crystal formation

expedition_journals.name: Botanical Research
expedition_journals.description: Study of magical plant species encountered
expedition_journals.hint: Inside the hollow of the ancient tree

expedition_journals.name: Archaeological Notes
expedition_journals.description: Documentation of historical discoveries
expedition_journals.hint: Carved into the stone tablet near the entrance

expedition_journals.name: Tactical Assessment #2
expedition_journals.description: Strategic analysis of enemy fortifications
expedition_journals.hint: Inside the abandoned siege weapon
expedition_journals.missable_reason: Siege weapon destroyed if you choose assault approach

expedition_journals.name: Diplomatic Correspondence
expedition_journals.description: Letters between expedition and local factions
expedition_journals.hint: Mailbox at the crossroads trading post

expedition_journals.name: Engineer's Technical Manual
expedition_journals.description: Advanced machinery operation procedures
expedition_journals.hint: Inside the control panel housing

expedition_journals.name: Mystical Research
expedition_journals.description: Study of magical phenomena and paint magic
expedition_journals.hint: Floating book in the library's upper level

expedition_journals.name: Combat Evolution Log
expedition_journals.description: Notes on party members' skill development
expedition_journals.hint: Under the meditation mat in the corner

expedition_journals.name: Resource Management
expedition_journals.description: Efficiency reports on resource gathering
expedition_journals.hint: Foreman's office desk drawer

expedition_journals.name: Environmental Impact
expedition_journals.description: Observations on expedition's environmental effects
expedition_journals.hint: Protected container near the cleanup station

expedition_journals.name: Cultural Exchange
expedition_journals.description: Notes on interactions with local populations
expedition_journals.hint: Inside the festival prize booth
expedition_journals.missable_reason: Only available during specific festival choices

expedition_journals.name: Leadership Challenges
expedition_journals.description: Gustave's reflections on leadership decisions
expedition_journals.hint: Hidden compartment in the map table

expedition_journals.name: Psychological Profile
expedition_journals.description: Analysis of party members' mental states
expedition_journals.hint: Inside the memory vault in the center

expedition_journals.name: Strategic Alliance
expedition_journals.description: Documentation of allied faction agreements
expedition_journals.hint: Treaty room's sealed document case

expedition_journals.name: Technology Integration
expedition_journals.description: Notes on combining magic and technology
expedition_journals.hint: Fusion chamber observation deck

expedition_journals.name: Final Preparations
expedition_journals.description: Last-minute expedition preparations and concerns
expedition_journals.hint: Command vehicle's glove compartment

expedition_journals.name: Point of No Return
expedition_journals.description: Final thoughts before entering the unknown
expedition_journals.hint: Pedestal before the final gate activation

expedition_journals.name: Into the Abyss
expedition_journals.description: First impressions of the expedition's true destination
expedition_journals.hint: Cairn of stones at the entry platform

expedition_journals.name: Revelation
expedition_journals.description: Discovery of the expedition's true purpose
expedition_journals.hint: Center of the revelation circle

expedition_journals.name: Sacrifice and Honor
expedition_journals.description: Tribute to those lost during the journey
expedition_journals.hint: Memorial wall's central plaque

expedition_journals.name: New Beginnings
expedition_journals.description: Hope for the future after expedition's completion
expedition_journals.hint: New growth sprouting from the center

expedition_journals.name: Legacy
expedition_journals.description: Final testament to Expedition 33's achievements
expedition_journals.hint: Base of the expedition monument

music_records.name: Paint Magic
music_records.location: Artist's Gallery - behind the main canvas

music_records.name: Lumière Record (Duplicate)
music_records.description: Special duplicate of a previous record
music_records.note: This is the only duplicate record in the collection

gestrals.description: Magical creatures that unlock Paint Spike ability for Lune

locations.name: Forest Gestral
locations.hint: Follow the trail of glowing paint drops

locations.name: Prismatic Gestral
locations.hint: Requires all 4 previous Gestrals to appear

esquie_rocks.description: Special stones that unlock movement abilities

locations.name: Aqua Stone
locations.description: Enables party to swim in deep water areas

locations.name: Depth Stone
locations.description: Allows diving to ocean floor locations

locations.name: Wind Stone
locations.description: Grants limited flight for reaching aerial areas

white_nevron.description: Rare crafting materials for ultimate weapons

paint_cages.description: Containers holding rare paint materials for Lune

all_records.bonus: Unlocks remix mode for battle music

all_gestrals.reward: Paint Master Achievement + Ultimate Paint Techniques

all_white_nevron.bonus: Can craft ultimate weapons for all characters

all_paint_cages.bonus: Lune's paint abilities have no resource cost

100_percent.reward: Master Collector Achievement + Expedition 33 Master Title
100_percent.bonus: Unlocks New Game+ exclusive content and developer commentary

festival_tokens.description: Special currency earned through various activities
